trans-unit.source: Filters the classes represented in an array of <xref:System.Type> objects.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器的数组中表示的类<xref:System.Type>对象。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The `TypeFilter` delegate is used to filter a list of classes.
Specifically, you use it to filter the classes represented in an array of <xref:System.Type> objects.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，你使用该值来筛选的数组中表示的类<xref:System.Type>对象。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.FindInterfaces%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method uses this delegate to filter the list of interfaces that it returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.FindInterfaces%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法使用此委托来筛选列表，它将返回的接口。</xref:System.Type.FindInterfaces%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Every derived class of <xref:System.Delegate> and <xref:System.MulticastDelegate> has a constructor and a `DynamicInvoke` method.
trans-unit.target: 每个派生的类<xref:System.Delegate>和<xref:System.MulticastDelegate>具有构造函数和`DynamicInvoke`方法。</xref:System.MulticastDelegate> </xref:System.Delegate>

trans-unit.source: See the Visual C++ code example given in the description for `Delegate`.
trans-unit.target: 请参见 Visual c + + 代码示例中的描述给定`Delegate`。
